WiiAccessories.name: wiispeak
WiiAccessories.description: microphone for Wii Speak Channel. A downloadable Wii Channel that allowed users to chat with friends online using the Wii Speak microphone accessory. discontinued in 2014. However, it has been unofficially re-released for use with homebrew projects like RiiConnect24 and Wiimmfi.

WiiAccessories.name: keyboard
WiiAccessories.description: The Logitech Cordless Keyboard for Wii provides special system keys -- such as Zoom In/Out, Forward/Back, Quit and OK -- making it even easier to use your favorite game console to communicate with your friends, surf the Web, read the news, check the weather, browse Internet videos and send e-mail.

WiiAccessories.name: udraw
WiiAccessories.description: The uDraw GameTablet is a gaming graphics tablet released by THQ for the Wii in 2010. It has a pressure-sensitive stylus which allows users to draw and view their creations on screen. The tablet is motion-sensitive through either the Wii Remote or internal accelerometers, which lets users tilt and roll the tablet for various changes in gameplay. Used for uDraw Studio
